title: Forest Fruits Nicotine Pouches By 77
description: TRY 77 FOREST FRUITS NICOTINE POUCHES Forest Fruits nicotine pouches by 77 is meant for lovers of fruits of the forest. These nicotine pouches are deliciously rich in their flavour and the high nicotine content makes the experience of these very good pouches even better. View all 77 Pouches View all Fruity Pouches View all Extra Strong Pouches KEY FEATURES: 20MG Per Gram | 10.4MG Per Pouch 8MG Per Gram | 5MG Per Pouch Forest Fruits flavoured nicotine pouches Recommended for experienced users Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free 20 pouches in each can MORE ABOUT FOREST FRUITS FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES Forest Fruit nicotine pouches are a deliciously fruity sweet nicotine experience. Packed with the flavours of fresh berries and fruits, the pouches' 20mg nicotine strength packs a real punch and is designed for experienced nicotine pouch users. MORE ABOUT 77 NICOTINE POUCHES 77 were the first polish brand of tobacco-free nicotine pouches. 77 offers one of the most diverse ranges of flavour on the market, 77 also hit the sweet spot with their nicotine levels. Switch up, switch down, mix and match â€“ do whatever suits you best! Flavours range from different types of mint to peach, apple, strawberries, and even classic tobacco.
